original_text: And he went, and fetched, and brought them to his mother: and his mother made savoury meat, such as his father loved.
korean_text: 그가 가서 끌어다가 어머니에게로 가져왔더니 그의 어머니가 그의 아버지가 즐기는 별미를 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: and brought them to his mother
and his mother made savoury meat
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어머니는 맛있는 고기 요리를 만들었다
